# Welcome {.unnumbered}

*Last updated: `r lubridate::now()`

<!--# This file is an intro to the *website.* intro.qmd is an intro to the *book.* -->

This is the website for the work-in-progress book, ***Web APIs with R.*** This book will teach you how to work with the web from your R session.

::: callout-warning
This book is very much a work in progress.

I am trying to dive in and do some actual writing, though!
:::

I am writing this book in a GitHub repository.
Follow the "Edit this page" or "Report an issue" links in the table of contents if you would like to help!

## The R4DS Online Learning Community {.unnumbered}

If you would like to discuss the contents of this book (or any other R-related topic), join the [R4DS Online Learning Community Slack](https://r4ds.io/join).
